graph1.title: Rack Elevation
graph1.description: A diagram illustrating the arrangement of IT equipment in a server rack, designed for tracking and managing data center resources.

graph2.title: Row Elevation
graph2.description: A diagram showing the layout of IT equipment in a single row of a server rack, used for tracking and managing data center resources.

graph3.title: Equipment Elevation
graph3.description: A diagram depicting the configuration of an individual piece of IT equipment, used for tracking and managing data center resources.

graph4.title: Butterfly View
graph4.description: A "Butterfly View" is a diagram illustrating a manhole's internal duct configuration, visualizing occupied and available conduits for telecommunications and utility management.

graph5.title: Butterfly View - Cables
graph5.description: This "butterfly view" shows the duct and cable configuration, allowing users to visualize and manage occupied and available conduits and cables within the manhole.

graph6.title: Butterfly View - Notes
graph6.description: This "butterfly view" provides additional notes and details about the manhole's configuration.

graph7.title: Dependency View - Access
graph7.description: Visual representation of different ways to access Dependency View from various parts of the application

graph8.title: Dependency View
graph8.description: The Dependency View visually represents network devices and their interconnections within an infrastructure layout.

graph9.title: Layer Manager
graph9.description: Interface that provides tools for organizing and controlling layers within a CAD-like workspace

graph10.title: Layer Manager 2
graph10.description: Another view of the layer management interface with additional filtering features

dialog1.title: Account Manager
dialog1.description: A user-friendly layout for managing account details, contact information, and billing settings with options to create new accounts and customize templates.

dialog22.title: Layer Manager
dialog22.description: Interface that provides tools for organizing and controlling layers within a CAD-like workspace

dialog23.title: Layer Manager 2
dialog23.description: Another view of the layer management interface with additional filtering features

tech2.title: AI in E-commerce: A Developer's Guide

tech3.title: Enthusiast Framework Documentation
tech3.description: Documentation site built with Docusaurus 3.9, featuring structured docs, blog with multiple posts, and modern documentation patterns including admonitions, code tabs, and responsive design.
